chapter.title: What This Guide Covers
chapter.para: Snowdrop is a utility package that contains JBoss-specific extensions to the Spring Framework. These extensions are either:

listitem.para: extensions to Spring Framework classes that can be used wherever the generic implementations provided by the framework do not integrate correctly with JBoss AS.
extensions for deploying and running Spring applications with JBoss AS.

chapter.para: This user guide aims to cover the functionality of Snowdrop, to describe its components, and to provide information on how to use it optimally for running Spring applications in JBoss AS.

important.title: Supported Spring Version
important.para: Snowdrop 1.2 and subsequent micro-release versions (1.2.1, 1.2.2, etc.) should be used with either Spring 2.5 (preferred version being Spring 2.5.6.SEC02) or Spring 3.0 (preferred version being 3.0.2.RELEASE and above)

important.title: Supported JBoss Version
important.para: Snowdrop 1.2 and subsequent micro-release versions (1.2.1, 1.2.2, etc.) should be used with JBoss AS 5.x.
